document_data.name: Talosian Shortspear
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Talosian shortspear''''' was a magical [[spear]] associated with the followers of [[Talos]].
document_data.Powers: It was a ''+1 [[shortspear]]'' with the ''[[flaming]]'' and ''[[shock]]'' special abilities.
document_data.Users: They were commonly wielded by veteran members of the [[church of Talos]].
